author: The Current
description:
Watch Jon Batiste talks about his inspirations behind the BIG MONEY album
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

Jon Batiste talks about what inspired him when making his 2025 album, BIG MONEY. "I thought that making a statement that was very pure and organic and direct would be a powerful antidote to some of the woes of this time that we're in," he says.

Watch the full interview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WbXrNGMf_8E

You can also find a full transcript and more on The Current's website: https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2025/10/27/interview-jon-batiste-talks-about-the-many-ways-music-inspires-and-connects 

Guest – @jonbatistemusic 
Host – Zach McCormick
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Executive Producer – Lindsay Kimball
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Production – Reed Fischer, Luke Taylor

Subscribe to our channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/893TheCurrent?sub_confirmation=1  

Like/Follow:
https://www.facebook.com/TheCurrent/

title: Jon Batiste talks about what inspired him when making "BIG MONEY" album

author: The Current
description:
To celebrate The Current’s 20th Anniversary, The Current’s Live Sessions Vault unlocks never-before-seen live performance videos of bands and artists who have played in our iconic studio. 

Watch to see the full session of Of Monsters and Men featuring previously unreleased footage, from when they visited The Current studio back in 2015.

Songs Performed 
00:00:00 I of the Storm
00:04:23 Organs
00:08:54 King and Lionheart

Musicians
Nanna Bryndis — vocals, guitar
Ragnar “Raggi” Thorshallsson — guitar, vocals, piano
Arnar Rosenkranz Hilmarsson — piano, guitar

Credits
Engineer – Michael DeMark, Tom Coughlin
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Visuals  – Nate Ryan
Digital Producer – Natalia Toledo
Graphics – Natalia Toledo

The Current’s Live Sessions Vault is supported by the Minnesota Orchestra, GS Motors, and Delta Dental of Minnesota Foundation.

Subscribe to our channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/893TheCurrent?sub_confirmation=1  

Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube

title: Of Monsters and Men - Full live session at The Current (2015)
